description: This dashboard uses the system metrics collected from the `hostmetrics` receiver to show CPU, Memory, Disk, Network and Filesystem usage
title: Host Metrics (k8s)

251c0d09-804b-46fa-b3bf-6498251a53b1.name: k8s.node.name
251c0d09-804b-46fa-b3bf-6498251a53b1.queryValue: SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s.node.name') AS `k8s.node.name` FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.time' AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s.cluster.name') = $k8s.cluster.name GROUP BY `k8s.node.name`

575a7337-465b-4c76-895b-c3b769271ff0.name: k8s.cluster.name
575a7337-465b-4c76-895b-c3b769271ff0.queryValue: SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s.cluster.name') AS `k8s.cluster.name` FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day WHERE metric_name = 'k8s.node.cpu.time' GROUP BY `k8s.cluster.name`

widgets.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.
widgets.title: Queue size
